src_original: yān dharmān średdhendriyeṇa śraddadhāti,  vīryendriyeṇa samudānayati /
yān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayati,  tān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa........... //
tān saṃkalpān na saṃkalpayati /  yaiḥ(saṃ)kalpaiḥ śīlasamādhiprajñā vimuktidarśanaskandhāḥ samuttiṣṭhanti,
yayā rāge nātmānaṃ na parāṃśca tāpayati,  nātmānaṃ na parāṃśca kleśayati,  nātmānaṃ parānnānupahanti,
